This sweatshirt is absolutely the best. I'm ordering more. They are so warm. They wash up nice.
Love the way the shirt feels and fits. I am 5ft and 130 I bought a small and it fits perfectly.

评论概述: Buttery soft and warm, good fit
评论详情: This fits true to size and is a nice material. Also very warm and comfortable. Perfect for a winter sweater. The color is a nice brown color and it has a good length it it (not long or short, which I prefer) as it is perfect to go with a pair of jeans. Not super tight around the neck either which is a plus for me.
This is the best for 20 degree weather. Keeps me toasty warm
This sweater is warm but not bulky.
I'm 5'9 and 155 lbs. I ordered size Large.
Super cozy. Perfect fit.
Definitely warm, stylish, fits nicely.
It's a little big, I normally wear size M, I ordered an M, it's a little loose, maybe I could order an S

This shirt is super warm and soft. My only issue is that it has shrunk to near crop top proportions after the first wash. Now, I wear it under a vest. It also started to pill almost immediately.  It's a bit pricey for what it is. I would consider buying it again if: It was -$15 And I would buy up a size to hopefully beat the shrinkage.
So warm/comfy.  Sizing like stated is small
Sweater is exactly what I wanted
5’2 - 125lbs. I ordered a large to be roomy. I was able to get it on, but skin tight
Fits to size. Lightweight fleece lined winter shirt. Soft breathable material.
This sweater was jammed in a plastic bag.  No label and completely wrinkled.  Really horrible presentation which cannot be used as a gift due to condition.

评论概述: Wish it was available in many more colors too
评论详情: I love it! It fits perfectly, it is soft, and warm. The arm length is perfect. I love the color. I already looked to see if it is available in some colors I need to find, but it is not. But this is a sweater to love, and to wear, and to be comfortable in as well as not being cold.
It is so warm, perfect for layering underneath. It can machine washed with little to no shrinkage. Although it is really comfortable, it runs a bit small so i would recommend buying a size up.
This sweater is my favorite for colder weather ! It fits perfect and u can dress it up or down . The inside is so fuzzy and soft . Its a perfect winter sweater for chilly days &  nights .

I bought some other sweaters with this item from other vendors on Amazon but this could be my favorite. It is thick and I am sure would keep me warm during our winter trips. Loved the color, quality and fit. Also it is really soft. Would buy kore color if this was little more affordable
Cozy and warm.  Just a little snug at the neck.  Overall good purchase
I want all the colors! I sized up one since it is fleece lined and it fits great. It’s super warm and is like wearing a sweatshirt but looks so much nicer!
Great quality, super warm and soft sweater, highly recommend. Fits true to size
This sweater feels AMAZING! It looks so nice and it feels even better. It washed well. It is seriously one of the nicest sweaters I have ever owned.

This sweater fits perfectly and is so very comfortable.  I usually need to layer tops to be warm in the winter, but this sweater is all I need.  It is stylish, rich looking, and not heavy.....just perfect!!  Plus you don't roast in it either.  I got one and then just had to have another one in a different color.  Thank you!!

评论概述: It feels so soft and warm.
评论详情: I like the different colors, very soft and warm. I had to buy more colors.

评论概述: Luxuriously Soft and Warm, But with a Few Issues
评论详情: I recently got this Zesica Fleece Sherpa Lined Sweater in the color Oats (size Medium), and I have to say, the inside is incredibly soft and luxurious. It feels amazing against the skin—so cozy and warm! I really like this sweater for its comfort and style, and I hope the fuzzy material inside holds up over time and stays as soft as it is now.  However, there were a couple of downsides. It arrived very wrinkled, and I had to steam out some deep creases, which was a bit of a hassle. Additionally, there was a small stain on the front of the sweater when it arrived, and unfortunately, it didn’t wash out.  Overall, I love how warm and comfortable this sweater is, but the stain and wrinkles were disappointing.
Me gustó la textura y comodidad de la Tela, Pero pedí talla small y creo q debe quedar más holgado , entonces no comprar la talla justa para que cumpla su objetivo
The sweater is wonderful for cold weather; however, it arrived in packing so tight that it was very wrinkled. I'll need to put it in the cleaners to remove the wrinkles.
I originally bought this in brown and loved it so much I bought it in green. It is so comfortable and warm, perfect for Minnesota winters- you do not have to layer because it is fleece lined.

Got this in a size small and it fits true to size.  The inside is quite soft and it feels very warm and cozy.  The styling is nice so you can wear it out and about casual or dressy.  Color is a darker green then I expected but I quite like it.  Washed on cold and delicate and dried on delicate and didn’t have issues with warping or shrinkage
this size is too tight and too small and i only weigh one hundred and I should take a size small

评论概述: Warm, soft, and not too thick
评论详情: I was looking for a warm shirt to wear in the evenings after work with sweatpants. I wanted something in between a long sleeve t-shirt and a full blown sweater, and I wanted it to be soft. I tried several shirts here on Amazon, and this one turned out to be a winner. It is very soft on the inside with a lining almost like fleece. That lining also makes it warm - maybe even as warm as your typical sweater. It is stretchy and flattering and overall a very nice shirt.

I was looking for some soft, stretchy, loungey kinds of shirts for laying around in after work and I came across this one. It is very soft and warm and the inside has a lovely fleece-y feel. In the end I found it a little too warm and decided to return it, but I do recommend the quality and feel of this shirt if you are looking for a cozy top.

评论概述: Nice shirt Looks like it will be warm.
评论详情: Looks like a great shirt
I liked the quality of this sweater but it ran too short for me.
Color: Perfect for fall Quality: Excellent Very soft & warm. Love it.

This white sweater is absolutely beautiful. In fact, I’m wearing it now. Extremely warm and comfortable. Fits true to size and looks so nice on. You can dress it up or dress it down. Looks great either way. This is a can’t miss add to your wardrobe.
WARM!  And very comfortable.  I like that it's a moderately thick shirt/thin sweater, but does the job of ten.  It's nice not to feel extra bulky!
Great fit,  I normally wear medium but sized up to allow for shrinkage.feels so soft & very warm. I hope they offer lots more colors soon. I love this product.

评论概述: Wife doesn't really like the fit
评论详情: I got this for my wife, thinking she would enjoy the sherpa lining for cooler days.  She usually wears a medium but the medium sleeves are really too short for her.  She's 5'3" 130lbs and it the body fit a bit loose but the arms were snug and on the shorter side.  I do admit it wasn't the most flattering on her but also not hideous either.  If it had a bit more shape to it I think it would have looked better.

This is perfect for cold days. You will need to size up. I'm most typically a medium but returned because it felt small. I will reorder in a larger size. A fitted look and very warm. The knit is tightly woven and gave me no indication it would pill. Great purchase if sizing had been more accurate.

评论概述: Nice quality but runs very small
评论详情: The sweater is great. It has nice quality and it soft inside, but the sizing is way off. I ordered a large as I tend to run between a medium and large. It was very tight! I ended up giving it to my 10 year old daughter because it fit her.

Living in Alaska, I always want products that are chic and functional. It’s really hard to find winter wear that not only looks good but also keeps you warm. This sweater looks like a normal turtleneck, but is super heavy for those cold days.
Returning.  Worn. Heavily perfumed. Wrong color sent
Unbelievably cozy but strange fit. I sized up to a medium- it was snug in the chest (I am not well endowed) and boxy in the belly. I’m bummed bc it was so cozy but it is going back.

评论概述: Great sweater but not so flattering
评论详情: It's comfortable and a good fit. Feels like it would be warm and cozy. But I tried it on and it's not flattering due to the bulk of it. If you're slim (or if you don't care about looking like you have some fat rolls) then this could be a great sweater. If you're like me and have a little body fat, then this will exacerbate the appearance of fat rolls. I'm not overweight, but I look a bit chonky in this sweater. The inner part creates some extra bulk and didn't provide a flattering look for me. If you're super slim, this won't be an issues. Or maybe you won't care!

This sweater blew me away when I received it.  Immediately the softness drew me in and I was hooked!  The inside of this sweater is lined with a luxurious Sherpa type material that will be sure to provide warmth even on the coldest of days.  The stretch of this fabric allows for the sweater to fit perfectly and most comfortably.  Everything about this sweater is superb— from the style and design to the fabrication and fit.  I would expect to pay upwards of a $100.00 or more for this quality, look and feel.  The size chart is spot on guiding me to my perfect fit.  This is a fabulous sweater at an amazing value!

ZESICA Women's Fleece Sherpa Lined Sweater Winter Thermal Shirts 2024 Long Sleeve Mock Neck Slim Fitted Pullover Tops…This is a nice sweater, sewn well and heavier than expected. It was also smaller than expected. I fall within the limits of the XL. 5’2” 140 lbs for reference. Bust 42. The Xl fit smaller than expected on me. I’m afraid once washed it could shrink too small. However, it does have some stretch to it. It’s the right length. I just wish it wasn’t a slim fit.

评论概述: looks nice, order the next size up
评论详情: This size is suppose to fit a bit looser, it's too tight.  If you prefer your sweaters to be a bit larger for more layers, order the next size.The sweater came in a vacuumed sealed bag.  I can't get the wrinkles out.

评论概述: Beautiful jewel green, so warm & cozy!
评论详情: I really love this shirt/sweater!  It is so warm and cozy, and the fleece lining is really full coverage and doesn't seem like it will pill up and go thin like other "fleece" lined items.  This is really thick and is really nicely shaped and has a great texture on the outside, I think this could be worn for the office with slacks (I definitely will) and dressed down with jeans or sweats to just be comfortable.  It's slim/body hugging, but not super skinny.  I got a Small and the shoulders, body length, and even the sleeves (which usually I have to cuff on most Amazon shirts) are perfect on me (5'1" 115lbs).  Size up if you are not petite or if you want something more loose fitting.  The green is gorgeous!  I washed in cold and air dried it flat and it was dry pretty quickly, despite how thick it is.

评论概述: Go up a size on this one, it’s a very HOT winter sweater
评论详情: Because this has a furry plush interior, it runs smaller than normal, so definitely go up a size for a normal fit, two sizes up if you want it loose fitting. For reference I’m 5’9” 38B 174 and I normally wear a large, I got an XL and it fits like a normal size large but not tight and not oversized at all, it fits nice. The exterior looks like a dressy tight weave knit sweater and the inside is thick plush and fuzzy. This is a very HOT sweater for those cold days, it’s like a thermal dressy sweater, it’s beautiful and doesn’t add bulk to the overall look but it’s definitely insulates you from the cold, as soon as you put it on your hot. It’s a very well made beautiful sweater, great for winter. Love this one, it’s unusual to find an insulated sweater all in one. Recommend

Has great material but runs too small. I normally wear a size small but purchase medium for colder months. This medium is the size of a small. But due to the remote area I live (no UPS drop off) I am not able to return the product so I will save it for a different season. I already ordered up. I would suggest ordering two sizes up in you are using it for the winter.
This sweater is thick, warm, cozy, and flattering. What more could you ask for? I love it. It's more than a shirt; it's a lovely mock-neck sweater that will be a winter favorite.
Very nice, warm and comfortable. Perfect for the Fall.

评论概述: Mock neck sits way higher than depicted, jsyk.
评论详情: This is a nice, solid sweater. It could be a stand alone piece, but honestly I think it's just best for layering seeing as how it's basic, thin, and lined. The furry lining is warm and plush and luckily the same color as the sweater itself so rolling the sleeves up won't look super weird or anything. Only thing of note is what I already put in the title, which is that the mock neck sits higher up on the neck than it looks like it will based on the product photos provided. It goes up high enough to hit almost like my other turtlenecks, only it doesn't need to be rolled down. Definitely overpriced; would probably only pay $20 for a sweater like this otherwise.

This sweater fits as expected and is thick and heavy material so very warm but still comfortable and stylish. The inside lining is very soft and cozy it’s perfect for being comfortable around the house, but easy to dress up with jeans to wear out. A new favorite sweater for my always cold mother.

This sherpa lined top is so soft and luxurious, it feels great against your skin.  It runs true to size, so order your normal size.  The coffee color is rich and earthy, perfect for colder weather.  This washed well without shrinkage (cold water only and line dry).  Definitely a new staple piece for winter, recommend.  I hope that this helps.

Buying clothes off Amazon is hit or miss but this one is a win! I love soft, quality fabrics and would never know this wasn’t a $100 sweater from Nordstrom. I usually wear a medium and ordered a medium and it for perfect. I got the beige color and it’s more of a champagne color, it’s beautiful.

I ordered this sweater in black and liked it so much I ordered it in green as well. The sweaters came nicely packaged, no weird smells, and are really nice quality. They are nicely sewn and didn't have any flaws. They are incredibly soft and comfortable. If you're tall, the sleeves are long and they actually come all the way down to my hands (which is super rare for me). I have a shorter torso and this fits me as I would want for length. It fits true to size and is very warm! It looks like a sweater with a half turtleneck. Just like what is pictured. The sweater in green didn't do me a lot of favors. It was a really pretty green color, looked just like it did on screen and I loved the look of it off! However on, for me, it was more something for comfort and warmth. The black one looks a lot better on me and more stylish. Still I love these tops and if you're looking for something soft, warm, and nice this is it!

I love this sweater, but I should have ordered one size larger. It hugs my body a bit more than I like. I was between sizes and went lower .... not a good idea if you don't want a body hugging sweater.  It's well made and I really like the thermal lining. Perfect for a fall or winter hike or as a layer for winter sports (but it is WARM, so don't layer too much on top of it).

This sweater is so warm and cozy and it looks really nice as well. The sweater is thick and fleecy, soft, and warm on the inside. The outside is very good quality sweater look. IT feels very well made. I have washed and dried it and it still looks brand new.

This is a thick, thermal sweater lined with fleece that is super warm and cozy! Not too heavy, but a great sweater for the winter to wear under a coat or jacket. Eliminates the need for multiple layers. Some wrinkles upon releasing this from it's shrink wrapped packaging, but those should dissipate after a day. Has a stretchy ribbed neck, cuffs, and waistline. True to fit for this size medium, and the fuzzy interior feels great against the skin.

My wife is always cold, she loves warm/hot weather. She isn't a fan of cold winter days/night. I am always looking for sweaters, blankets, shoes that will keep her warm. She ordered her regular size and it does fit but she feels she should have sized up for a little looser fit. This sweater is a knit that is fleece Sherpa lined and is thick and stretchy. It is a heavy garment that is well made and you can feel the quality of the product. The sweater is soft, very warm and comfortable. It came really wrinkled and she will probably have to stream press the sweater to get the wrinkles out. We go camping in our RV quite often and this sweater will be perfect for her to wear during the cold nights around the campfire.

This thermal really blurs the line between a sweater and a thermal, and I love that about it! It’s surprisingly heavier than I expected, but in a good way. The soft, fluffy lining feels amazing and really adds to its cozy warmth. It came vacuum packed, so it was full of creases, but a quick steam took care of those. The fabric is thick, stretchy, and is perfect to wear with jeans, etc., making it a great choice for casual days.  I love that it’s true to size, with sleeves that are the perfect length. The mock neck is also a nice touch—it's not tight, and while it’s not lined like the rest of the interior, it still provides good coverage. I actually appreciate that difference. It feels great worn on its own, thanks to the fuzzy interior, but it’s also perfect for layering. Plus, it’s easy to care for—just toss it in the wash with cold water and hang to dry.  Overall, this thermal is perfect if you're looking for something warm and comfortable.

This is such a pretty sweater.  It is a knit that is lined with fleece and has the stretchiness of a knit, combined with the warmth of fleece.  It is a heavy garment and you can see and feel the quality of the product.  Most people will probably think that the sweater runs small; I usually wear an X-Small and this Small fits me perfectly, making it a 0-2 size.  However, I am thrilled with it.  The sweater is hip length and the sleeves have tasteful cuffs.  It would be fine to wear as a dressy garment, perhaps with wool slacks, but also great with jeans.  I ordered the rust color and love the richness of the shade.  I can't wait for it to get cold where I live so that I can wear it.

This sweater is very soft, warm and cozy. Perfect for cold winter days. It has a mock turtleneck, which helps a lot staying warm as well. The material is stretchy and soft.  About the size, so I ordered a small, which is the smallest available size, my bust size is 36, waist 29 and hips 33. this sweater is a relaxed fit on me, so it doesn't hug the body. So I'm thinking if you're a few inches bigger than me, this will be nicely hugging your body, it you are my size or smaller it would be a more relaxed fit, however it still looks and feels good.

This sweater has an almost furry fleece on the inside making it very soft, warm and comfortable. I love the fit. It's fitted and true to size. It looks great and doesn't look like a sweatshirt. It looks more like a sweater, just with furry fleece on the interior. Can't wait to wear this on cold winter nights with jeans and a cute pair of boots!
